description.translate: On your way will rise many tyrants, but none will resist you!

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Don d'Adros\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Sur ton chemin se dresseront moult\"}","{\"text\":\"§7tyrans,mais aucun ne te résistera !\"}","{\"text\":\"§7On your way will rise many tyrants,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but none will resist you!\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a3 §7HER§a1\"}"]}}
